column26: Device was heavy and not ergonomic
Device was heavy, but handles made use better
Device was initially OK, but was heavy by the end of the test
Thought device was meant to help with motor impairment or simulate it
Recognized that device was trying to guide to some point, felt that if told purpose would have tested feedback
Rig felt like it was coming off-balance and rebalancing itself
Felt direction while tracking only in one dimension
Felt jolts while photographing, but not while tracking
Felt more stable while device was on while tracking
